definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: They are connected by aluminum-alloy attachment fittings and hinged to the rear spar and rear false spar.
sentences.chinese: 擾流板通過鋁合金連接接頭鉸接到後梁和假樑上。

sentences.english: Install top cover of rear spoiler .
Screw on spoiler and additional wing.
sentences.chinese: 擰緊擾流板和附加翼子板。

sentences.english: SPOILER is installed on the piston rod of each servo-control.
sentences.chinese: 在每個伺服控制器活塞桿上安裝擾流板保險卡箍。

sentences.english: The retainer plate remains on the rear spoiler .
sentences.chinese: 固定板保留在後擾流板上。
將擾流板安裝在後輪上。

sentences.english: Remove rubber sleeve from rear spoiler and unwind the adhesive tape.
sentences.chinese: 拆下後擾流板的橡膠套並鬆開膠帶。

sentences.english: Every part of this guide will be in spoiler.
sentences.chinese: 每一部分將在本指南中的擾流板。

sentences.english: The effective resistance reduction of interceptor is mainly coming with the decrease of residual resistance.
sentences.chinese: 艉擾流板減阻效果的獲得主要是來源剩餘阻力的減少。

sentences.english: What exactly is this spoiler, you may ask?
sentences.chinese: 究竟是什麼，這擾流板，你可能會問？
